I'm striving to make it the best movie site ever. üé•üçø

---

## üçø**TheMovieBrowser.com**

**[The Movie Browser](https://themoviebrowser.com)** is built to enhance the way you explore and interact with movies and TV shows. Some key features include:

- **Watch Links**: Quickly find where your favorite movies are streaming, a one stop place to aggregate every streaming provider and you can continue where you left off\*.

- **Ratings**: Get ratings from all the major sources in one place.

![alt text](https://vootlachaitanya.com/_ipx/_/images/tmbratings.png)

- **Intelligent Recommendations:** get AI powered recommendations using OpenAI embeddings and vector database

- **Powerful custom filters:** create powerful custom filters to suit very specific needs, you can create a [filter to just see comedy war movies that are streaming on prime video](https://themoviebrowser.com/browse?) or [every apocalyptic movie](https://themoviebrowser.com/browse?) if youre into that

‚ú® **Explore it live** [Visit The Movie Browser](https://themoviebrowser.com)
